Mariner 4 was the fourth in a series of spacecraft intended for planetary 
exploration in a flyby mode. It was designed to conduct closeup scientific 
observations of Mars and to transmit these observations to Earth. Launched on 
November 28, 1964, Mariner 4 performed the first successful flyby of the planet 
Mars, returning the ... flyby of the planet Mars, returning the first pictures of the 
Martian surface.
